title: Road to Philly Bike Expo 2021: Tom La Marche Breaks and Makes Bikes
content:
From riding with the Specialized team to TIG welding his own frames – Tom La Marche’s career has been nothing if not varied. Tom was driven to make frames out of a desire to ride something he created. We caught up with Tom in advance of the Philly Bike Expo, where he’ll be debuting a

The post Road to Philly Bike Expo 2021: Tom La Marche Breaks and Makes Bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
